text:
Elvie | London, UK | Full-Time, Onsite | https://www.elvie.com

Elvie is an award-winning FemTech company designing the next generation of connected devices supporting women worldwide through the various stages of womanhood.

Based in London’s famous Hatton Garden, we’re in the final stages of bringing our phenomenal second product to market.

We have a number of open marketing roles at the moment, but we’re always on the lookout for talented hardware and software engineers, designers, data scientists and plenty more!

Find all our openings and apply via Workable here: https://elvie.workable.com
